entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Light snow ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
